reviewText: I purchased this DVD as a birthday gift for a childhhod friend. I personnally have not watched the DVD, but my friend was very pleased to receive it by mail. We were both Cincinnatti Reds fans growing up, and of course Johnny Bench being our favorite player. I think it is great to be able to purchase an item like this for special occassions and have it delivered in time as a gift for when you are not able to be there personally.
